TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LosFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 序列化 Web Form 網頁的檢視狀態。

span.span: Serializes the view state for a Web Forms page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限制的物件序列化 (LOS) 格式器可供高 compact ASCII 格式序列化。The limited object serialization (LOS) formatter is designed for highly compact ASCII format serialization. 這個類別支援序列化物件圖形中，但最適合用於包含字串、 陣列和雜湊表。This class supports serializing any object graph, but is optimized for those containing strings, arrays, and hash tables. 它提供許多.NET Framework 基本型別第二個順序最佳化。It offers second order optimization for many of the .NET Framework primitive types. 這是私用的格式，而且只會針對 Web 要求的存留期保持一致。This is a private format and remains consistent only for the lifetime of a Web request.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 將指定的檢視狀態值轉換成有限物件序列化 (LOS) 的格式化物件。

span.span: Transforms the specified view-state value to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

.method public hidebysig instance object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
public: System::Object ^ Deserialize(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);

span.span: A that contains the view-state value to transform.

summary.span: 將包含在 物件中的檢視狀態值轉換成有限物件序列化 (LOS) 的格式化物件。

span.span: Transforms the view-state value contained in a object to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.
A LOS-formatted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法用來轉換中所包含的檢視狀態值LOS 格式化物件的物件。This version of the method is used to transform the view-state value contained in a object to a LOS-formatted object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

summary.span: 將指定的檢視狀態值轉換成有限物件序列化 (LOS) 的格式化物件。

span.span: Transforms the specified view-state value to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.
A LOS-formatted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法用來轉換指定的檢視狀態 LOS 格式化的物件值。This version of the method is used to transform the specified view-state value to a LOS-formatted object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: The view state is invalid.

summary.span: 將有限物件序列化 (LOS) 的格式化物件轉換成檢視狀態值。

span.span: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Serialize (System.IO.Stream stream, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Serialize(class System.IO.Stream stream, object value) cil managed
public: void Serialize(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The to receive the transformed value.

param.name: value
param.span: 要轉換成檢狀態值的 LOS 格式化物件。

span.span: The LOS-formatted object to transform into a view-state value.

summary.span: 將有限物件序列化 (LOS) 的格式化物件轉換成檢視狀態值，並將結果放在 物件中。

span.span: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value and places the results into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法用來將 LOS 格式化的物件轉換成檢視狀態的值。This version of the method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. 結果會放置於物件。The results are then placed into a object.

span.span: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value and places the results into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法用來將 LOS 格式化的物件轉換成檢視狀態的值。This version of the method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. 結果會放置於物件。The results are then placed into a object.
